Silence is violence, but words are also violence. And the truth hurts, which is why the Canadian Cancer Society has apologized for using the word “cervix” instead of “front hole” because of course, the left turned this into a thing.

Canadian Cancer Society sorry for using 'cervix' instead of 'front hole' for LGBTQ+ community https://t.co/kPhKsDMVkU pic.twitter.com/91yFXKNxy8
— Toronto Sun (@TheTorontoSun)
title: Cancer charity forced to apologize to LGBTQ community for calling a woman's cervix a "cervix," insult women instead with new term

Bias alert: We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website have been fans of Rep. Byron Donalds since literally his first-floor speech in Congress. By most accounts, he's on Trump's shortlist for vice president. The constitutional lawyers can figure out if he can run with fellow Florida resident Trump. title: Trump VP prospect drops BOMBS on Biden, compares him to NY Jets: "He sucks, and we all know he sucks"
